metadata.dc:author: Moya Vázquez, R
Asanza Llorente, J A
Arcos Navarro, A
Olivar Buera, M
Díaz Oller, J
metadata.dc:description: The Buschke-Loewenstein tumour is a rare variety of squamous cell carcinoma of low-grade malignancy; it is located in the external genital organs and the perianal region. We present a new case of this uncommon tumour of short evolution in a 73 years old male patient. Resection was the only treatment, without relapse at 12 months. A review of the literature shows only 13 cases previously published; we comment the human papillomavirus role in their pathogenesis and the various therapies proposed, concluding that the best is surgical treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma verrucoso del margen anal. Tumor de Buschke-Loewenstein.
[Verrucous carcinoma of the anal margin. The Buschke-Loewenstein tumor].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
